recaps.1: Ciri has fully embraced life with the Rats criminal gang, taking on the name Falka and participating in their violent activities. Her transformation from innocent princess to hardened criminal is complete.
recaps.2: The bounty hunter Leo Bonhart tracks down the Rats, beginning a campaign of terror against them. His reputation as a killer of witchers makes him one of the most dangerous opponents Ciri has faced.
recaps.3: Bonhart destroys the Rats in a violent confrontation, killing most of the gang and capturing Ciri. This marks the end of her criminal phase and the beginning of a new form of captivity.
recaps.4: Geralt's company continues their relentless search for Ciri while she is held prisoner by Bonhart, who forces her to fight in arena matches for entertainment and profit.
recaps.5: Various factions including Nilfgaard continue hunting for Ciri while Bonhart maintains his cruel hold over her. Yennefer pursues her own investigation into Ciri's disappearance.
recaps.6: The political situation becomes increasingly complex as multiple parties converge on Ciri's location. Vilgefortz's true plans begin to become clearer as he prepares his final moves.
recaps.7: Ciri begins experiencing interdimensional travel, visiting different worlds and times. She encounters the Aen Elle elves including Avallac'h, who claims to want to help her understand her Elder Blood powers.
recaps.8: Ciri's journey through different dimensions continues as she learns more about her powers and destiny. Meanwhile, Geralt's company and other factions prepare for a final confrontation.
recaps.9: The various storylines begin to converge as Ciri's interdimensional journey brings her closer to understanding her true role in the cosmic conflict. Geralt and Yennefer prepare to reunite their efforts.
recaps.10: All parties move toward the final confrontation as Ciri's location becomes known. The stage is set for the climactic battle that will determine her fate and the future of the world.
